data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pedroso, Denis Rafael, Baptista, Renner Luiz Cerqueira (2014): A new troglomorphic species of Harmonicon (Araneae, Mygalomorphae, Dipluridae) from Para, Brazil, with notes on the genus. ZooKeys 389: 77-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.389.6693, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.389.6693
